website_summaries.verdict: If Caterpillar is your brand and you want the most powerful, well-equipped model available, chances are you won't mind the high price tag that comes with this top-of-the-line portable generator.
pros: Not only does it offer 12,000 running watts of power, but with 9 outlets, LED control panel, near effortless electric start, and a rugged build, it's ready to tackle most consumers' power needs with ease
cons: It's expensive compared to Caterpillar's other portable models, and it's heavy to maneuver
But if optimal power is what you need, these concerns probably won't bother you

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful unit that's built to the CAT quality you'd expect. Clear instructions and the warranty is sufficient. Upon inspection of engine and various parts, there was no machine oil or markings. Everything was very clean and seemed put together with care. The unit started on its first attempt and runs smoothly under the power of my 240v plasma cutter and high-end air compressor under simutanious load. While the price is steep it is well worth the purchase if you have the money. I have yet to come across a better portable generator.
customer_reviews.author: Twisted-Tastes

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought my cat gen over a year ago for emergency power in Florida. I had an electrician install a transfer box/switch as well as a hard start kit ( a small part) on my central a/c. This is how you can conserve power to run your central unit. It runs virtually the entire house and a/c. I start it monthly for 30 mins---and it starts within 3 turns of the electric start. It is a good feeling to own something you can count on--especially in a hurricane state like ours.
customer_reviews.author: 1989nyc

customer_reviews.title: Starts up and runs great. Very portable and runs our equipment without bogging ...
customer_reviews.text: Starts up and runs great. Very portable and runs our equipment without bogging down. One issue that was a concern when we ran it for the first few times was the amount of smoke coming off the engine. Checked it over several times and all was good just seemed to burn off excess fluids from outside components used in the manufacturing of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Biker

customer_reviews.title: Amazon helped a little, cat dealer helped a little, but i still have a junk generator!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had a missing oil drain plug , Amazon has a great customer service that made things right. Generator works great for my food truck . Plan to purchase a second one in the future. 4/25/2020 generator down AGAIN cat power is junk!!! Not heavy duty as they claim, multiple problems in my 3 years I've owned it
customer_reviews.author: cmac

customer_reviews.title: Protect your investment
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use it yet but it's been tried out many times. It's the best bang for the buck out there. It will even run my 3 ton central A/C.(with no other appliances on) My electrician who installed my transfer switch liked it. Just must take care of it though. It requires 90 octane gas. I purchased a cover until we can get a shed put up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Everything comes very well packed!
customer_reviews.text: Everything comes very well packed and the generator well protected only a nut of the brackets with rubber did not arrived, only added oil and gas, connected the battery turned it on and tried it so far so well, I have not yet subjected it to a considerable load. As it is at level and near the sea I protected it with BOESHIELD T.9 rust & corrosion protection. I will inform by having new news.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo RUP

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of power. Used it to power up my motorhome Ran all three ACs without a hitch Put gas and oil in it hooked up the battery and it fired right up
customer_reviews.author: 1Ronin

customer_reviews.title: Private labeled harbor freight trash
customer_reviews.text: If you are considering buying this generator, do yourself a favor and run. I'm the proud owner of two of these pieces of crap. They both failed with less than 20 hours. Nobody will work on them and there is no warranty. The name Caterpillar is deceiving. They private labeled this garbage and don't stand behind their product. Amazon turns their heads like the manufacturer when issues arise. The motor stops working. The wheels have fallen off. The breakers trip non stop. That's just a small taste of the issues we've had. Good luck in your search but don't buy this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan L.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this machine!
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be a "professional grade" generator. We had problems with this machine from day one. It has been to the repair shop 7 times for: Belching out white smoke; broken starter switch (three times); broken wheels (twice); no electrical power. When its not in the repair shop, we keep it at our shop as an emergency only backup to my other 4 generators (Generac's). Save yourself some grief and buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Graham

customer_reviews.title: CAT is #1
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these Cat generators for many years and it hasn't skipped a beat. I do take good care of my machines and know how to operate them properly so making them last and last is very easy for me. Although I have seen these take abuse I can't even mention here and they keep running like a watch. GO CAT MACHINES !!
customer_reviews.author: DEUCE

product_meta.title: RP12000E 12000 Running Watts/15000 Starting Watts Gas Powered portable Generator 502-3699
product_meta.description: Get more work done with this premium quality, heavy duty generator from heavy-equipment leader Caterpillar. The Cat RP12000 E delivers 12kW of long-lasting, high quality power to handle multiple tools. Built with a 670cc V-Twin OHV engine, this generator handles peak starting loads of up to 15kW so you can power multiple tools and appliances. The premium all-copper generator produces a high quality power suitable for sensitive electronics. Low-idle mode option automatically keeps your fuel consumption in check and minimizes engine wear and tear. The extra-large steel fuel tank strategically positioned above the motor does double duty as a sound buffer and lets you run for over 11 hours without stopping to refuel. Additional premium features like the LED-lighted operator station, easy-to-move design, removable lifting eye and durable-all steel wheels set this generator apart from the pack as a workhorse with the comforts you expect from a Cat product. Standard 2-year limited, extended to 3-year limited when registered within 30 days of purchase.
feature_bullets: Fuel efficient 670cc v-twin OHV engine with idle mode option with pressurized oil system
11. 2 hours of runtime on one tank at 50% load
Low harmonic distortion generator (THD < 5%) with AVR
Control panel on one side for easy operation

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars21 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
